text: Following are the results of the 1951 Soviet First League football championship. FC MVO Moscow winning the championship. ==Final standings== ==Relegation play-off== To the play-off qualified the champion of the 1951 Football Championship of the Ukrainian SSR and the worst Ukrainian team of masters of the 1951 Soviet Class B. |} ==See also== * 1951 Soviet Class A * 1951 Soviet Cup ==References== * 1951 at rsssf.com 1951 2 Soviet Soviet
title: 1951 Soviet Class B
